Shree Ajit Pulp and Paper Ltd Company Profile

Shree Ajit Pulp and Paper Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of Kraft Paper (Testliner/Multilayer Testliner), which is used for manufacturing corrugated boxes. The Company's principal products/services include Multilayer Testliner & Testliner Paper. The Company operates through two segments, which include Paper and Power generation by Windmill. The Company manufactures Multilayer Testliner and Testliner Paper from approximately 70 to 300 grams per square meter (GSM) and approximately 16 to 35 busting factor (BF). These products are available in two shades, including Natural and Golden Yellow. This product is used for making Duplex Cartons, Corrugated small e-fluet as packaging material. The Company has two wind mills for capacity of approximately 2.75 megawatts (MW) in Gujarat State. The Company's manufacturing unit is located in the state of Gujarat, India at Morai, Vapi.
